pages.text: $(9)Knockback Resistance$() is how resistant you are to being knocked back by attacks. At the max value, you are immune to knockback.$(p)Usually provided by armor or shields.
$(9)$(n)Base Value:$() 0$(p)$(9)$(n)Max Value:$() 1$(p)Note: Modifiers providing this value say they provide 10x what they really provide, so +1 Knockback Resistance is really +0.1.
